channel.title: Anselmo L. S. Melo's Git Achievements

item.title: Master Author (Level 13)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Architect (Level 8)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: News Reader (Level 4)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 3)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Apprentice News Reader (Level 2)
item.description: Show logs with difference each commit introduces with git whatchanged

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 12)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Archivist (Level 7)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Cathedral Worker (Level 6)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Cleaning lady (Level 10)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Master Butcher (Level 11)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 13)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Pilgrim (Level 8)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Master Miller (Level 12)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 7468 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Historian (Level 11)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Traveler (Level 3)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Archivist (Level 6)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 9)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Fisherman (Level 6)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Hunter (Level 7)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 2)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.
